name: Ricks-Car-Spaceship
title: Rick’s Space Cruiser – a flying car
author: AivanF
description:
Wanna be the coolest engineer owning a fancy Car Spaceship of Rick Sanches? Now you got it! The mod add Space Cruiser – a fast yet steady and spacious flying vehicle that behaves as a robust aircraft – unlike airplanes, it doesn’t require a runway as it has no takeoff & braking distance. The car has no built-in weapons, but provides a decent equipment grid. It's a late-game technology by default, but there is a setting to make it mid-game..

I’m not a I’m not a professional 3D artist, but hopefully it looks good ^_^ Cross-planet travelling and overhaul mods integrations are planned, as well as better graphics. Also, I can make several skins or tiers if it will be interesting to many players.
